name: Real Taxi Driving 3D - Parking Expert
description:
Cab is active for dropping its passengers but need some skillful drivers. Get in the car and show your skills and guts.

An awesome adventure of Taxi Car Parking and carrying few bureaucrats to save location. Yes Sir! You need to be on your toes and complete all 20 levels but wait...... There is timer ticking, might be someone is in danger. You need to drop the bureaucrat to a save location in a hurry.

Features
- HD Graphics
- 20 Levels
- Easy Controls
- Multiple Taxi Cars
- Awesome Sound Tracks
